code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var userSlice=createSlice({name:'user',initialState:{email:'',name:'',token:'',permissions:''},reducers:{login:function login(state,action){var email=action.email,token=action.token,permissions=action.permissions;console.log('LOGOWANIE');state.email=email;}}});var login=userSlice.actions.login;export{login};export var loginAsync=function loginAsync(email,password){return function(dispatch){setTimeout(function(){var token='TEMP_TOKEN';var permissions='ADMIN';dispatch(login(email,token,permissions));},1000);};};export var selectUser=function selectUser(state){return state.user;};export default userSlice.reducer;
